LBL.AX.summary: LaserBond Limited, a surface engineering company, engages in the development and application of materials, technologies, and methodologies to enhance operating performance and wear life of capital-intensive machinery components. The company provides drilling tools; and laser cladding, thermal spray, welding, machining, heat treatment, metallurgy laboratory, surface coating, and remanufacturing services. It also licenses its surface engineering technologies. The company serves mining, drilling, mineral processing, power generation, transport and marine, plant and machinery, manufacturing, fluid handling, and agriculture sectors. LaserBond Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Sydney, Australia.
